The '''Tokoyo Reisen''', once known as the '''River Lethe''', is a stream located in the [[Evernight Temple]], [[Enkanomiya]]. The [[Traveler]] obtains the [[Waters of Lethe]] from here in the [[World Quest]] ''[[Lotus Eater]]''.
